entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
